armour.name: Aquila Armour
armour.desc: Mk.7 Armour, the most numerous version in the arsenal of the Chapter.

armour.name: Corvus Armour
armour.desc: Mk.6 Armour, famed for excellent mobility and stealth capacity.

armour.name: Maximus Armour
armour.desc: Mk.4 Armour, widely regarded as the best powered armor among all existing Mark.

armour.name: Iron Armour
armour.desc: Mk.3 Armour, which sacrificed its mobility in exchange for even greater protection.

armour.name: Errant Armour
armour.desc: Mk.8 Armour, with better protection in comparison to the more modern mark.

armour.name: Artificer Armour
armour.desc: Customized armors made by the Chapter's Techmarines, these boast extreme protective power and capability.

weapon.name: Knife
weapon.desc: In the hand of demigods, even a humble knife can be deadly.

weapon.name: Chainsword
weapon.desc: The main melee weapon of the Astartes, their teeth can bite through steel with little effort.

weapon.name: Power Sword
weapon.desc: The most common form of power weapon, its power field can penetrate most armor with little issue.

weapon.name: Power Axe
weapon.desc: The axe sacrifices finesse and speed for even more striking power.

weapon.name: Crozius
weapon.desc: The Crozius Arcanum is both a potent weapon and a symbol of a chaplain's faith.

weapon.name: Power Fist
weapon.desc: When you want to punch tanks out of existence, accept no substitute.

weapon.name: Power Claw
weapon.desc: The Power Claw's purpose is to gut heavy infantry. Repeatedly.

weapon.name: Eviscerator
weapon.desc: A heavier, two handed version of the chainsword that offer a little more power and strength.

weapon.name: Bolter
weapon.desc: This trusty weapon is the default choice for an Astartes.

weapon.name: Flamer
weapon.desc: A flamethrower loaded with promethium that incinerate steel as easily as flesh.

weapon.name: Plasma Gun
weapon.desc: This weapon traded its safety in exchange for excellent destructive power.

weapon.name: Melta Gun
weapon.desc: As per its name, it can melt adamantium and flesh with equal ease, yet is hindered by its short range.

weapon.name: Storm Bolter
weapon.desc: Essentially two bolters in one package, this weapon can lay down a curtain of fire by itself.

weapon.name: Sniper Gun
weapon.desc: Combine adequate power and long range, this is the favorite weapon for the Scouts, who lacks the heavier Power Armor.

weapon.name: Bolt Pistol
weapon.desc: Handheld version of the ubiquitous bolter, similarly versatile and powerful.

weapon.name: Plasma Pistol
weapon.desc: A rare weapon, it bring no less destructive power compare to its larger cousin.

weapon.name: Heavy Bolter
weapon.desc: Upscaled and with dedicated feeding mechanism, it can cut through infantry with horrifying ease.

weapon.name: Heavy Flamer
weapon.desc: Expert in clearing out swathes of lightly armored infantry, it is however an infuriatingly short ranged weapon.

weapon.name: Missile Launcher
weapon.desc: With two different warheads, it excels at nothing yet terrible at neither.

weapon.name: Plasma Cannon
weapon.desc: Rare. Powerful, especially against light vehicles and/or heavy infantry.

weapon.name: Multi Melta
weapon.desc: This monstrous weapon can annihilate tanks easily, should any foolish enough to come to its range.

weapon.name: Lascannon
weapon.desc: Deadly against single target and heavily armoured vehicles, complemented with excellent range.

weapon.name: Battle Standard
weapon.desc: A ceremonial standard that influence all soldiers in battle.

accessory.name: Ammunition Feeder
accessory.desc: Certain heavy weapons utilized by the Astartes require this feeding mechanism.

accessory.name: Jump Pack
accessory.desc: A Jump Pack allow the Assault Marine to easily pass obstacle and grant extra movement speed.

accessory.name: Iron Halo
accessory.desc: Emit a reductor field that disperse enemy attacks upon impact.

accessory.name: Rosarius
accessory.desc: Emit a conversion field that convert approaching kinetic energy into light.

accessory.name: Psychic Hood (Amplify)
accessory.desc: This device allow the psyker wearing it greater control over the Warp's energy flow.

accessory.name: Psychic Hood (Protective)
accessory.desc: This device reduce the Peril of the Warp to a much safer level.

accessory.name: Cyclone Missile Launcher
accessory.desc: Essentially two giant racks that can launch a deadly barrage of missile.

accessory.name: Teleport Homer
accessory.desc: Allowing Astartes to travel through the Warp and immediately arrive at the necessary position.

chassis.name: Rhino
chassis.desc: The Rhino chassis is the most common and likewise the most versatile base.

chassis.name: Land Speeder
chassis.desc: The Land Speeder is a nimble skimmer vehicle tailored to light skirmishing and scouting missions.

chassis.name: Land Raider
chassis.desc: The Land Raider performs as Superheavy troops carrier, with the firepower of a heavy tank and ability to carry Terminators into battle.

vehicle_weapon.name: Pintle-mounted Storm Bolter
vehicle_weapon.desc: While potentially useful, many vehicle do not mount such weapon due to the distraction it provided.

vehicle_weapon.name: Pintle-mounted Storm Bolter (automatic)
vehicle_weapon.desc: Come with an extra cogitator, this weapon do not use the skill of the gunner, at the expense of its own accuracy.

vehicle_weapon.name: Pintle-mounted Multi Melta
vehicle_weapon.desc: Sometimes, the Land Raider meet something similarly armoured. This multi melta is the answer to that predicament.

vehicle_weapon.name: Twin-linked Heavy Bolters
vehicle_weapon.desc: The default weapon loadout for a Razorback, this can lay down heavy fire at a distance.

vehicle_weapon.name: Twin-linked Heavy Flamers
vehicle_weapon.desc: Exclusive to the Blood Angels and their successors, its short range is mitigated by the destructive fire it spew forth.

vehicle_weapon.name: Twin-linked Multi Melta
vehicle_weapon.desc: The prized melta weaponry can penetrate the thickest of armors, but needed to close in to launch their attack.

vehicle_weapon.name: Twin-linked Lascannon
vehicle_weapon.desc: With the longest range among all Razorback variants, it fits perfectly with a combat squad of Devastators.

vehicle_weapon.name: Autocannon
vehicle_weapon.desc: The main armament of Predator Destructor, its shells are most effective against heavy infantry and light vehicles.

vehicle_weapon.name: Sponsons Heavy Bolters
vehicle_weapon.desc: Complementing the main weapon, the side-mounted heavy bolters can cut down swathes of light infantry.

vehicle_weapon.name: Twin-linked Lascannon
vehicle_weapon.desc: The main armament of Predator Annihilator, the twinned lascannon can penetrate all by the heaviest of armor.

vehicle_weapon.name: Sponsons Lascannon
vehicle_weapon.desc: On the rare possibility that the main weapon failed to kill, this can definitely finish the job.

vehicle_weapon.name: Demolisher Cannon
vehicle_weapon.desc: The powerful Demolisher cannon can easily obliterate a squad of infantry with a single shot.

vehicle_weapon.name: Whirlwind Hellfire Battery
vehicle_weapon.desc: The whirlwind package echo the Adeptus Astartes' modus operandi - overwhelming force in a compact package.

vehicle_weapon.name: Pintle-mounted Heavy Bolter
vehicle_weapon.desc: The default main armament for a Land Speeder, ready to lay down a curtain of bolter shells.

vehicle_weapon.name: Pintle-mounted Multi Melta
vehicle_weapon.desc: A dedicated tank hunting weapon which capitalize on the Land Speeder's overwhelming speed.

vehicle_weapon.name: Pintle-mounted Heavy Flamer
vehicle_weapon.desc: Coupling with the Land Speeder's swiftness, this weapon can easily burn out enemies cowering inside fortified position.

vehicle_weapon.name: Typhoon Missile Launcher
vehicle_weapon.desc: The heaviest among Missile Launchers, it also have different warhead suited for different purposes.

vehicle_weapon.name: Underslung Assault Cannon
vehicle_weapon.desc: The assault cannon can fire thousands of shells per minute, and is truly a versatile weapon.

vehicle_weapon.name: Underslung Heavy Flamer
vehicle_weapon.desc: Because nothing can beat the feeling of surfing atop a wave of flame.

vehicle_type.name: Rhino
vehicle_type.desc: The Rhino APC had been the Astartes' main transport since its rediscovery.

vehicle_type.name: Razorback
vehicle_type.desc: A variant of the Rhino, the Razorback sacrifice some troops carrying capacity in exchange for a deadly primary weapon.

vehicle_type.name: Predator
vehicle_type.desc: A full-pledged tank in its own right, the mighty Predator driven by an Astartes is a foe to be reckoned with.

vehicle_type.name: Vindicator
vehicle_type.desc: A siege vehicle armed with the devastating Demolisher Cannon and a Siege Shield, it excels at fighting in close quarters.

vehicle_type.name: Land Speeder
vehicle_type.desc: The Land Speeder's excellent speed and armament allow it to be the spearhead of every Chapter's armored assault.
